resources.string: This is a mobile app that analyses sprinting technique from a starting stance in terms of acceleration. It analyses the start stance for the 3 point start. This is the most commmonly used start position in the majority of sports today. The first 3 steps are the most critical parts as these could be the difference between winning and losing for many athletes in their sport
The video below explains the first 3 steps of the technique

– Fitting in the Outline Image: Fit in the image by standing 5 yards back from the camera. Crouch down with right knee on the ground with both hands on a line and shoulders directly above hands. Raise right knee off the ground until straightened while simultaneously pulling left arm back to 90 degrees until hand is at hip level.

– Press arrow and start record.

– The video will last for 2.00 seconds.

– Press OK/Save. Press Cancel to take another video.

– Drawing Tool: (Diagonal Line Button) Draw lines and angles over the video. Press button twice to cancel.

– Side by Side Comparison: (Rectangles Button) Compare taken video with expert video side by side. Videos can be played separately and simultaneously using the bottom play button.

– Screenshot: While using the tools, work can be saved by screenshotting.
